text: Alfredo Siojo Lim (; 21 December 1929 - 8 August 2020) was a Filipino politician. He served as Mayor of the City of Manila from 1992 to 1998 and 2007 to 2013. He also served as senator of the Philippines from 2004 to 2007. He ran for president in 1998, but lost to Joseph Estrada. He lost his re- election campaign in 2013, but lost to former President of the Philippines Joseph Estrada. He ran again in 2016, but narrowly lost to Estrada again by less than 1%. On 7 August 2020, Lim was hospitalized in Manila with COVID-19. He died the next day from the infection at the age of 90.Ex-Manila Mayor Alfredo Lim passes away at 90 -report ==Notes== ==Other websites== * * *Alfredo Lim's Assets and Liabilities *The Mayor's Page *The Official Website of the City of Manila *Alfredo S. title: Alfredo Lim
